name: Blobymon
description:
Travel the world with your humble pet, Blobbert, on your quest to murder some small defenseless animals and get your own tank.

Download the exe and move it to the desktop, then run. It will not work in the downloads folder.

Connecting programming by David Johnston

Battle programming by Riley Kuiper

Overworld programming by Tris Replogle

3D models, animations, and dialogue by Ethan Kohlbacher

2D assets, animations, and sounds by Elijah Garmon
